title: Can't launch the legacy client
body:
Hi there,
I've noticed that the legacy client is still there (not for long, but still), and I wanted to launch it so that I can do an item set for Kindred, since that the new client supports item set from the legacy client, but I can't launch it, it does nothing.
And when I try to launch "lolpatcher.exe" (cuz when there were an update with the legacy client, I couldn't launch it the day of the patch), it simply says that BugSplat.dll and RiotLauncher.dll is missing.

What can I do? I tried to repair it from the new client, but it did nothing :/
Should I download the missing files? If yes, where should I put them?

replies.body: Hi have you tried launching the new client and at the bottom right corner tried clicking on the "Launch Legacy Client" I do this all the time to gain access to the legacy client. Hope this helps :)
well I tried launching the legacy client as well, but all it says for me is that "PvP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working." any ideas on how to fix this?

I'd suggest trying to launch the Legacy Client through the updated client. You can find that option in the bottom right of the new client, once you hit that it'll relaunch the legacy client.

https://i.gyazo.com/8f0a8f50a3c395e35fb68a5a8654f852.png

Hey there,

I'm sorry, I didn't put that in my post, but this is what I did the first time I wanted to launch it, it simply did nothing.
Then, I wanted to launch it with the lol patcher from the legacy client, but still nothing, it just says that I miss two files (again, BugSplat.dll and RiotLauncher.dll).

Hmmmm yea that will be an entirely different problem! It sounds like some of your game files might have become corrupted. Check out the [**Bug Splat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) instead!

None of these solved my problem. It's just a Windows popup that tell me that the software has missing files, and that's it.

EDIT: I did a full repair last night, it didn't solve my problem either

Since none of that seems to be helping at all, your issue might be a little more in depth than I first thought. Let's get you in touch with our tech guys so you can get a little more one on one troubleshooting. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can go much more in depth there!
